ygData.subject: Re:  Lambent
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sylly couldn t find her way out of a paper bag.  Let alone, help someone with armor quests =) ... Innoruuk server highlevel guilds are begining to pick up
ygData.messageBody:
> So, Kenross - I'll be glad to help you get some Lambent - gimme a tell when
> you are on!

Sylly couldn't find her way out of a paper bag. Let alone, help
someone with armor quests =)


> Not that I couldn't have afforded to BUY some of this stuff. I have 2000pp in the
> bank. Still, twinking has done OK by me. ;)
> Kenross Cantoforjado (The Talquinn), 33 songs, Innoruuk


Innoruuk server highlevel guilds are begining to pick up bards
like mad. There are very few highlevel 'knowledgable' bards
on Innoruuk. The few that are out there were swept up into
the top guilds, the up and coming bards (that show promise)
are being pulled into said guilds as well. Perhaps to be
powered up to a level where they become more useful. Bards
have always been sort of outcasts, but now the true power is
shining through. Lots of people are playing 2nd toon bards,
as well.

Harmonic.
